name: 塞巴斯蒂安·海丁格尔
name_full: 塞巴斯蒂安·海丁格尔 Sebastian Heidinger
introduction: Sebastian Heidinger was born in 1978 in Füssen, in the Bavarian region of Allgäu, Germany. After first working as a production assistant and editing assistant, he later worked as a lighting technician, soundman and in development. From 2002 to 2007 he studied Directing for Film and Television at the German Film and Television Academy Berlin (dffb). Along with directing, Heidinger also works as a film editor, writer and university lecturer. In 2007, he co-founded Boekamp & Freunde Filmproduktion along with Nils Boekamp, and in 2010, he founded neueluegen, a production platform for transcultural film.
